wheelchairBoarding: There is no accessibility information for this stop.
wheelchairBoarding.0: There is no accessibility information for this stop.
wheelchairBoarding.1: At least some vehicles at this stop can be boarded by a rider in a wheelchair.
wheelchairBoarding.2: Wheelchair boarding is not possible at this stop.

locationType: A location where passengers board or disembark from a transit vehicle.
locationType.0: A location where passengers board or disembark from a transit vehicle.
locationType.1: A physical structure or area that contains one or more stop.
